body: Thank you, Mostapha! However, the points get from deconstruct mesh a 3D chart or bar chart are too many for text annotation (see image below, the value for that single bar is shown all the 4 corners of the mesh of the bar). Plus, the text is behind the bar mesh geometry and it's difficult to read without turning off the preview of the mesh. I wonder if the 3D chart and bar chart components can add a "value annotation position" option to define a single point for each mesh to position its value if needed.
